name: Grilled Chicken Salad
description:
A refreshing mix of greens topped with juicy grilled chicken.
Feta cheese, cucumbers, and tomatoes add a Mediterranean touch.
Light, healthy, and packed with protein.

name: BBQ Ribs Plate
description:
Slow-cooked ribs glazed in smoky BBQ sauce.
Served with crispy fries and creamy coleslaw.
A must-try for meat lovers.

name: Cheesy Nachos
description:
Golden tortilla chips smothered in melted cheese.
Topped with jalape√±os, olives, and fresh salsa.
Perfect for sharing or snacking solo.

name: Vegan Buddha Bowl
description:
A vibrant bowl filled with roasted veggies and quinoa.
Chickpeas, avocado, and greens add richness and texture.
Finished with a creamy tahini drizzle.

name: Avocado Toast
description:
Crispy toast layered with creamy mashed avocado.
Garnished with radish slices, chili flakes, and olive oil.
A trendy and nutritious breakfast choice.

name: Chocolate Waffle
description:
Fluffy waffles infused with rich chocolate flavor.
Topped with whipped cream and a chocolate drizzle.
A heavenly treat for dessert lovers.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description:
Classic pizza with a crispy golden crust.
Loaded with spicy pepperoni and gooey mozzarella.
An all-time favorite for every pizza fan.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description:
Al dente spaghetti topped with rich meat sauce.
Simmered with herbs, garlic, and ripe tomatoes.
A comforting Italian classic.

name: Caesar Salad
description:
Crunchy romaine lettuce tossed in creamy Caesar dressing.
Topped with parmesan shavings and golden croutons.
Simple, classic, and always satisfying.

name: Blueberry Pancakes
description:
Stacked fluffy pancakes filled with juicy blueberries.
Served warm with butter and maple syrup.
A sweet way to start your morning.

name: Margherita Pizza
description:
A timeless favorite topped with fresh mozzarella.
Basil leaves and rich tomato sauce bring vibrant flavor.
Light, simple, and perfectly satisfying.

name: Four Cheese Pizza
description:
A cheesy masterpiece with mozzarella, cheddar, gorgonzola, and parmesan.
Creamy and rich with a golden, crispy crust.
A dream come true for cheese lovers.

name: Veggie Delight Pizza
description:
Loaded with bell peppers, mushrooms, olives, and onions.
A fresh, colorful, and crunchy vegetarian feast.
Perfectly balanced and full of flavor.

name: Meat Lovers Pizza
description:
A hearty mix of pepperoni, sausage, bacon, and ham.
Savory and satisfying with every bite.
For serious meat enthusiasts only.
